means: 标新立异的人，持不同意见的人

sentence.Network_en: Her independence and maverick behaviour precluded any chance of promotion.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的独立精神和自行其是断送了一切升迁的机会。

sentence.Network_en: You're a maverick and you'll try anything.
sentence.Network_cn: 你是个爱自行其是的人,样样事情都要尝试一下.

sentence.Network_en: He was too much of a maverick ever to hold high office.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太特立独行，永远不可能做高官。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 赌侠马华力 ( maverick) 朱迪·福斯特梅尔朱迪·福斯特怀念尿布,可代言精子银行空中危机 ( flightplan) 朱迪·福斯特杰西朱迪&#183.
无论是翼虎(Maverick)、探路者(Explorer)、远征军(Expedition)、旅行家(Excursion),还是林肯的领航员(Navigator)都是各中极品,每个产.
有趣的是小牛(maverick)也有“特立独行者”的意思，而Jet & Cord就死在特立独行上。连续两个赛段在航班上落后却凭借完成任务的优 …

list.abs: ...控制论方面的专家龚维博教授）那儿买了一个破旧不堪的福特小牛（Ford Maverick），该车的原车主是哈佛的何玉奇教授（现任清 …
...口车上好像还真不多见，来自美国本土生产的2005款福特翼虎(Ford Maverick)似乎已经做好了这样的准备。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from the name of Samuel A. Maverick (1803–70), a Texas engineer and rancher who did not brand his cattle

encyclopedia.content: Maverick是一个轻量而完备的MVC Model 2框架。Maverick的Action称作Controller。Controller只接受一个ControllerContext参数。request，response, servlet config, servelt context等输入信息都包装在ControllerContext里面，而且Model也通过ControllerContext的model属性返回。整个编程结构清楚。但由于ControllerContext只有一个model属性可以传递数据，程序员必须把所有需要的数据都打包在一个对象里面设置到model属性里。这种麻烦自然而然会导致这样的可能用法，直接把Controller本身设置为model，这又回到了Controller和Model一体。

entry.tran: (团体中)自行其是的人，特立独行的人,标新立异的人
entry.def: If you describe someone as a maverick, you mean that they are unconventional and independent, and do not think or behave in the same way as other people.

example.ex: He was too much of a maverick ever to hold high office.
example.tran: 他太特立独行，永远不可能做高官。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who exhibits great independence in thought and action
2. an unbranded range animal (especially a stray calf); belongs to the first person who puts a brand on it

sentences.sentence: "she led a somewhat irregular private life"
